dialog.name: Jane
dialog.text: Can you here me? Are you already?

dialog.name: Worker
dialog.text: Yeah, I am already, for most part at least, but as you can see the rubble keeps me trapped.

dialog.name: Jane
dialog.text: Lets try to lift it then, doesn't seem to heavy.

dialog.name: Worker
dialog.text: Not a chance, just standard lightwight steam pipe stuff, but heavily interconnected. We need a plasma cutter to free it.

dialog.name: Jane
dialog.text: Plasma cutter, hm, wher could I find one down here?

dialog.name: Worker
dialog.text: To your left you fine a mine digger, that might have one its its tool box.

dialog.name: Jane
dialog.text: Ok, hold on, I'll be right back in a moment.
